p.p: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, that describes a code to indicate NHS Continuing Healthcare Accept Response message types.

p.strong: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK CHCAcceptMessageType subset where the subset original id yet to be defined.

p.p: The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."
